enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve querying or modifying the state related to BUSD auto-conversion settings.
Both methods require similar input parameters related to asset conversion, which can be reused for setting up tests.
The output of getBusdAutoConvertions() can be used to verify the state changes made by switchBusdAutoConversion().
The history of BUSD conversions can be checked to verify the effects of enabling or disabling auto-conversion.
